(await ethers.provider.getBlock(1))       // melihat blok ke-1
(await ethers.provider.getBlockNumber())
exit
console.log(uri);
const uri = await nft.tokenURI(1);   // ambil tokenURI tokenId = 1
const nft = await ethers.getContractAt("SimpleNFT", "0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3");
console.log(uri);
const uri = await nft.tokenURI(1);
const nft = await ethers.getContractAt("SimpleNFT", "0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3");
